name: fire-blast
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.black-white: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.
